text: Anastasiia Akchurina (born 14 June 1992 as Anastasia Mihailovna Chervyakova; ) is a Russian badminton player. She won the 2009 European Junior Badminton Championships in the girls' doubles event in Milan, Italy. == Achievements == === European Championships === Women's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
